pages.text: $(li)When a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/hammerhead_shark)Hammerhead Shark$(/l) attack a prey, it may loose a $(l)Shark Tooth$().$(br)$(li)It can be rarely obtained trading with a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seal)Seal$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield_of_the_deep)Shield of The Deep$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)When a Hammerhead Shark attacks a prey, it may loose a $(l)Serrated Shark Tooth$().$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield_of_the_deep)Shield of The Deep$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
